channel.title: ChaCha
channel.description:
There was a thread on Chacha.com a while back and it was possibly the funniest thread, ever. Anyways I remembered about it the other day and Ive been screwing off on it for a while. For those that dont know, chacha.com is like a search engine but with real people searching for your stuff. So you can ask for really stupid or funny things for them to search and have fun with the guides. They made you have to register now to search with a guide, though. But its still really entertaining. Ill start off with some Ive done while on my search for the meaning of life.
Status: Connecting ... Status: Looking for a guide ... Looking: ... Status: Cristi has connected to help you with your search on the meaning of life. Please wait while your guide searches for your results. Cristi: Welcome to ChaCha! Cristi: Hey You: Hello Cristi: Hi there, How can I help you today? You: I need to know the meaning of life Cristi: Life is a state ofmind You: Prove it Cristi: you want some websites? You: sure Cristi: Ok, one moment while I look that up for you... You: Interesting. Cristi: yeah? You: yeah Cristi: yeah You: indeed Cristi: Is there anything else on this topic I can find for you today? You: no im good Cristi: You have a nice day and thank you for using Cha-Cha! Cristi: Please RATE ME. Thanks for using ChaCha.
Janice: Welcome to ChaCha! You: hi You: I need to know the meaning of life Janice: hey there You: hi Janice: just sent you a result but give me a few minutes to send you some otheres Janice: others You: cristi was a noob, she didnt help at all You: oh k Janice: You will need to open these sites and recieve the several answers; this can not be answered in one sentence You: well thats always good Janice: here comes a good one You: zomg thats amazing Janice: yeah, I could spend to much time reading that one Janice: well I certainly hope I have helped you Janice: have a good one You: joo 2 Janice: ciao for now! :) You: what You: whats a ciao Janice: bye for now! Janice: ciao means bye You: fine Janice: have a good night Janice: Please RATE ME. Thanks for using ChaCha.
Juliet: Welcome to ChaCha! Juliet: Hello. You: hi Juliet: Please clarify your search topic so that I can catagorize it properly. Thanks. You: l337 h4x You: I need them Juliet: What are they? You: Im not sure Juliet: Ok. Thanks. You: You're welcome. Juliet: I'll search and then categorize Juliet: While I am searching, have you had a chance to look at the relevant links at the side of the page? You: no Juliet: Please let me know if this is what you're looking for. You: I believe this will suffice. Juliet: Thank you. Juliet: Is there anything else on this topic I can find for you today? You: no Juliet: Fine, thanks. Juliet: Bye. You: bibi Juliet: Please RATE ME. Thanks for using ChaCha.

item.title: ChaCha
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Yeah i was the maker of the first chacha thread, fun times =D

I donâ€™t go on it anymore, last time i looked i think you have to sign up for an account to be eligable to have a guide when you search.

Read full topic

item.title: ChaCha
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

2 and 3 were kinda funny, 1 was stupid.

Read full topic
